text: Fabien Thiémé (11 July 1952 – 27 December 2019) was a French politician. Thiémé was born in Valenciennes, France. Thiémé was elected to the National Assembly as a member of the French Communist Party from Nord's 21st constituency in 1988. He lost re-election in 1993. Thiémé was mayor of Marly, Nord from 2008 until his death. Thiémé died on 27 December 2019 in Marly from problems caused by myocarditis, aged 67. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:2019 deaths Category:French mayors Category:French communists Category:People from Nord
title: Fabien Thiémé
